name: Last Santa Standing
description:
HO HO HO, welcome to Last Santa Standing. A game created for the Cozy Winter Jam 2022. 

Have fun with your friends in this merry battle royal! Choose between multiple santas and kick  be the last santa standing, to prove that you and only you can be the real santa! 

🎅 Team 🎅:

Daniel García Barajas - Designer and programmer

Joan Daniel Guerrero García - Designer and programmer

Juan Pablo Huerta de Rubin - Music designer

Milk model: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-milk-65810704bb70413ba458744fe39e0e77

City model: https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/uvw-polygons-unity-3d-model-1294342

Cookie model: https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/free-3ds-mode-simple-gingerbread-character/...

Elfs model: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/character/fantasy-character/new-yers-elv...

Santas model: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/character/fantasy-character/santa-claus-...

This game is still in progress and we will keep working to make it better! We would really appreciate your feedback.

Happy holidays!

- Arcade Dogo 🐶
